abilities.name: Delta Reserve
abilities.effect: As long as Pidgeot has any Holon Energy cards attached to it, each player's Pokémon (excluding Pokémon that has δ on its card) can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Rotating Claws
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy card attached to Pidgeot. If you do, search your discard pile for an Energy card (excluding the one you discarded) and attach it to Pidgeot.
